title: Requirements V2 Addendum - Corrected with 6 User Feedbacks
response:
Feedback Summary (3 comments):

Specific Text Comments:
1. "Monitors execution via **status polling** (shrimp_...": agent-producer shouldn't poll status, instead agent-producer should be able to receive event from agent-designer, agent-programmer, agent-artist when they finished their tasks. Also, I want to add shadow-agent-designer, shadow-agent-programmer, shadow-agent-artist in this architecture, they should be monitoring agent-designer, agent-programmer, agent-artist throughout the task execution process. For example, every time an agent do something, such as create files, modify files, remove files, move files, shadow-agent should commit and push that change to remote github repo, there will be three remote repo for shadow agents in this case.
2. "**agent-producer: User Verification and Git Push**": agent-producer should git push in agent-playground, while agent-designer, agent-artist, agent-programmer use gitworktree to work in their own directory.
3. "Network Names": use artist for agent-artist's network name
